name: Looney Tunes Collector: Martian Alert!
description: Alert! Alert! Calling all Looney Tunes! Help Bugs Bunny collect 25 Looney Tunes allies. Use their special abilities to find the 10 missing pieces of the teleporter weapon and throw Marvin the Martian all the way back to Mars! But your fun doesn't end there! Trade with your friends to collect 22 additional characters used to access hidden missions. And th-th-that's not all, folks! Stay tuned for Marvin's chance to attack!
